mapper.select: select region_no as regionNo, trip_no as tripNo, to_char(begin_date, 'yyyy. mm. dd.')||' ~ '||to_char(end_date, 'yyyy. mm. dd.') as tripDate, floor(end_date - begin_date) as tripDay, region_country||'-'||region_city as regionName from my_trip join region using(region_no) where trip_no in( select trip_no from trip_member where member_id = #{_parameter} ) order by trip_no
select dense_rank() over(order by trip_date) as tripDate, trip_spot as tripSpot from trip_detail where trip_no = #{_parameter} order by trip_date, trip_order
mapper.insert:
select trip_board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into trip_board values( #{tripBoardNo}, #{tripBoardTitle}, #{tripBoardContent}, #{tripRoute}, #{tripBoardWriter}, sysdate, 0, #{regionNo} )
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as rnum, trip_board_no as tripBoardNo, trip_board_title as tripBoardTitle, trip_board_content as tripBoardContent, trip_route as tripRoute, trip_board_writer as tripBoardWriter, to_char(trip_board_date,'yyyy. mm. dd.') as tripBoardDate, to_char(trip_board_date,'hh24:mi') as tripBoardTime, read_count as readCount, region_no as regionNo, filepath from( select * from trip_board join photo on(trip_board_no = board_no) where board_class = 3 order by trip_board_no desc ) ) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
